sentences.sentence: He exploded in a paroxysm of rage.
He broke into a paroxysm of coughing.
sentences.translation: 他一阵猛咳，身体剧烈颤动。

sentences.sentence: All we have left is paroxysm, and when it subsides, there will be just one wisp of smoke. Our inner fire will ravish all.
sentences.translation: 我们所剩下的只有身体震颤，当它平息的时候，只有一缕轻烟。我们内心的火焰会吞噬一切。
